question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is closer to the camera?
A. orange "Z" sign
B. fire hydrant
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The fire hydrant is in the foreground, occupying a large portion of the frame and appearing large and detailed, while the orange "Z" sign is on a building in the background, making the depth relationship very obvious.
